pageContext.claim: “The Senate should get funding done before the August break, or NOT GO HOME. Wall and Border Security should be included. Also waiting for approval of almost 300 nominations, worst in history. Democrats are doing everything possible to obstruct, all they know how to do. STAY!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has been slow to submit nominations to fill his government, and many have significant vetting problems. meanwhile, Trump's judicial nominations are moving through the Senate at a record pace.
